aboutIntro.title: Why Choose Darb Study International?
aboutIntro.subtitle: With over five years of experience, we at Darb Study International take pride in being official representatives of prestigious universities and educational partners. We achieve a success rate exceeding 95% in securing university admissions and visas, offering our students a guaranteed path to achieving their academic ambitions.

ceoMessage.title: Message from the CEO
ceoMessage.quote: "Our vision at Darb is to pave the way for every ambitious student to achieve their dream of studying abroad. We don't just offer consultations — we build bridges of trust and support to ensure a successful educational journey and a bright future."
ceoMessage.name: - Ahmad Al-Ali, Founder & CEO

features.text: Comprehensive support from paperwork to arrival
Transparent pricing with no hidden fees
Physical offices in Berlin, Amman, and Bucharest

members.name: Alia Khan
members.bio: Expert in German universities with 7 years of experience helping students.

members.name: Markus Schneider
members.bio: Specialized in admission requirements and visas for Germany and Romania.

members.name: Fatima Al-Zahraa
members.bio: Supports students at every step, from housing to cultural integration.

members.name: Radu Popescu
members.bio: Knowledgeable about the best universities and programs in Romania.

members.name: Sami Haddad
members.bio: Helps students from the Middle East transition to studying in Europe.

members.name: Elena Fischer
members.bio: Builds and maintains strong relationships with our university partners.

whoWeAre.heroTitle: Your Partner Towards a Bright Future
whoWeAre.heroSubtitle: At Darb Study International, we are more than a student services agency; we are your trusted partner on your academic journey. Our belief that education is the key to unlocking potential drives us to provide comprehensive, personalized support from the first step to achieving your goal.
whoWeAre.storyTitle: Our Story: A Path of Inspiration
whoWeAre.storySubtitle: Darb started from our personal experiences as international students. We faced challenges and wished for a guiding hand. From there, we decided to be that guide for the students who come after us.

storyPoints.title: The Beginning: A Spark of an Idea
storyPoints.description: A vision born from necessity, to provide accurate information and honest support for ambitious Arab students.

storyPoints.title: Growth: Building Bridges
storyPoints.description: Expanding our network of prestigious university partners and building a team of dedicated experts serving students.

storyPoints.title: Our Mission: Our Compass
storyPoints.description: Connecting Arab students with the best international educational opportunities, with our absolute commitment to transparency, integrity, and student-first service.

storyPoints.title: Our Vision: Empowering the Future
storyPoints.description: Empowering every student to achieve their academic and personal aspirations with confidence, to become future leaders in their communities.

storyPoints.title: The Future: Global Horizons
storyPoints.description: We aspire to be the first destination for Arab students, committed to our core values and continuous innovation in our services.

whoWeAre.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide every decision we make and every service we provide.

values.title: Integrity & Transparency
values.description: We adhere to the highest standards of honesty and clarity in all our dealings.

values.title: Student First
values.description: The student's interest is our compass, and their success is our top priority.

values.title: Excellence & Innovation
values.description: We constantly strive to provide innovative solutions and services that exceed expectations.

values.title: Continuous Growth
values.description: We believe in continuous learning and development for ourselves and our students alike.

whoWeAre.featuresSubtitle: We don't just provide a service — we build a relationship. Here's what makes us the ideal choice for your educational journey.

features.title: Expert Team
features.description: We have deep expertise in educational systems across Europe and the Middle East, especially in Germany, Jordan, and Romania.

features.title: Personal Guidance
features.description: We provide guidance specifically designed to fit each student's individual needs and circumstances.

features.title: Full Transparency
features.description: Our processes are clear and fully transparent, with no hidden fees or unexpected surprises.

features.title: Cultural & Language Support
features.description: We understand cultural and linguistic challenges and provide the support needed to overcome them successfully.

features.title: Strong Partner Network
features.description: We have a strong network of trusted partners including universities and service providers in our study destinations.

features.title: Ongoing Support
features.description: We accompany you at every step, from travel preparation to ongoing support during your studies to ensure your success.

whoWeAre.processDesc: We follow a transparent and organized process to ensure an exceptional experience and the best results for every student.
whoWeAre.ctaLine1: We invite you to start your journey with us with confidence. Your success is our success.
whoWeAre.ctaLine2: Your trusted partner for achieving the dream of higher education.
